item.description:
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming!
We usually provide handouts and have appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up.
*********************************************
Back by popular demand!!

Bring your "burning questions" re: how to live a jOYful, fulfilling life using LOA and other Universal Laws. We'll breakout into smaller groups to discuss and contemplate, using our group wisdom to arrive at solutions, suggestions etc...

Paula Parnagian, gifted facilitator and BostonLOA member, has graciously agreed to guide us once again to get what we need from the discussions as a group and individually.

We'll have other seasoned members facilitate the smaller group discussions.


***Got to our Message Board and read the answers to some of the burning questions asked at our November 2008 Meetup. **

(1) How do we stay focused on what we want, without allowing ourselves to be distracted by the world around us?
http://lawofattractio...

(2) How to use Law of Attraction in business?
http://lawofattractio...

(3) How to have a spiritual perspective in everyday life?
http://lawofattractio...

*****************************************************************
About Paula Parnagian:
www.WorldViewServices.net
to contact Paula: Info@WorldViewServices.net

With over 20 years of experience in organizational consulting and training, Paula helps individuals and organizations get quickly and simply to the heart of the matter to prosper and thrive, individually and collectively. She does this with deep understanding, experience and insight.
================
For directions & parking info:

(1) Go here: http://lawofattractio...
(2) Sign in
(3) Scroll and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"
